features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: Email/password auth via NextAuth with Supabase session management; route protection via middleware and server components; email verification and password reset.

features.name: QR Code Generation (Basic)
features.description: Generate static QR codes with customization options including colors, size, logo, format, dot types, corner styles.

features.name: QR Code Generation (Advanced)
features.description: Advanced QR code generation with templates, gradients, shapes, frames, stickers, effects, and watermark overlay.

features.name: Dynamic QR Codes
features.description: Short links mapped to target URLs with ability to update destination, enforce expiration/scan limits, and track analytics.

features.name: Scan Tracking & Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive scan tracking with user agent, IP address, location (country/city), device, browser, OS, and timestamps. Analytics dashboard with visualizations.

features.name: Dashboard & Management
features.description: Authenticated user dashboard to manage QR codes, view analytics, perform CRUD operations, and access settings.

features.name: File Uploads & Image Management
features.description: Validates and uploads logo/image files to Supabase Storage for embedding into QR codes with optimization.

features.name: Payments & Billing (Razorpay)
features.description: Complete payment system with Razorpay integration for purchasing credits/subscriptions, invoice management, webhook handling, and billing enforcement.

features.name: API Keys & Developer Tools
features.description: API key generation, rotation, usage tracking, and developer documentation for programmatic access.

features.name: Organizations & Team Management
features.description: Multi-user organization management with member roles, invitations, and team collaboration features.

features.name: Custom Domains
features.description: Custom domain management with DNS verification, SSL certificate management, and domain routing.

features.name: Webhooks
features.description: Webhook management system for QR code scan events with delivery tracking and logs.

features.name: Notifications System
features.description: In-app and email notifications with preferences management and digest emails.

features.name: Admin Console
features.description: Admin dashboard for system management, user impersonation, billing adjustments, and system health monitoring.

features.name: Rate Limiting & Security
features.description: API rate limiting, CSRF protection, security headers, audit logging, and circuit breaker patterns.

features.name: Email System
features.description: Multi-provider email system supporting Resend, SendGrid, AWS SES, SMTP with transactional templates.

features.name: Pricing & Plans
features.description: Public pricing page with plan comparison and subscription management.

features.name: QR Code Bulk Operations
features.description: Bulk QR code generation, export, and streaming capabilities.

features.name: Brand Kit Management
features.description: Brand kit management for consistent QR code styling with custom logos, colors, and templates.

features.name: Internationalization (i18n)
features.description: Multi-language support with translation management.

features.name: Performance & Reliability
features.description: Performance optimizations including retry logic, timeout handling, optimistic UI updates, and caching.

features.name: Observability & Monitoring
features.description: Error tracking with Sentry, metrics collection, logging, and web vitals monitoring.

features.name: Middleware & Routing
features.description: Route protection, security headers, dynamic short link routing, and domain routing.

features.name: Supabase Client & Utilities
features.description: Centralized Supabase client configurations, shared utilities, validation, and error handling.

features.name: API Routes (RESTful endpoints)
features.description: Comprehensive Next.js API routes for QR codes, analytics, billing, organizations, admin, webhooks, and more.
